results.title: Red stone dancer: Henri Gaudier Brzeska
results.brief_description: A study of one of Gaudier-Brzeska’s most important sculptures, seen in different aspects of movement and light. The structure of the film is based on the characteristics found in a roll of film offcuts: random rhythms, interrupted movements, repeated movements, and the image relationships created by those movements and the static shots. Electronic sound track devised by Arthur Cantrill.

results.title: Red poll
results.brief_description: The Red Poll breed of cattle, which originated in East Anglia, England, is enjoying an increasing popularity throughout the world. It is a dual-purpose breed, providing milk and beef combined. The film explains to farmers the breed’s main characteristics and its advantages.

results.title: Red light in full flight
results.creator_credit: Sharyn Prentice, Samia Mikhail and Flamingo Star Films
results.brief_description: The culture of Middle eastern belly dancing in Australia is a prolific one, with belly dancers in Australia outnumbering dancers in other countries. The director gleans anecdotes about the history of this sensual womens’ dance and interviews Australian dancers about their dance, their lives and their culture. It also discusses the importance of traditional cultural dance in women’s lives.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sharyn Prentice, Samia Mikhail and Flamingo Star Films

results.title: Red firecracker, green firecracker [DVD] = Pao da shuang deng
results.creator_credit: Yung and Associates, Chan Chun-Keung, Yung Naiming and He Ping
results.brief_description: Cai Chunzhi’s (Jing Ning) family own a prosperous firecracker factory on the banks of the Yellow River in Northern China. When her father dies, because she is the only child she inherits the factory and becomes “Master”. She dresses like a man and everyone addresses her as “Master” but as a woman, her hold on power is tenuous and she carefully respects the authority of the factory head, Man Dihong. When she hires an artist to paint door gods for the Chinese New Year her life is turned upside down. Niu Bao is a handsome young painter whose pride and headstrong nature put him on a collision course with Dihong, as Bao and his ‘master’ struggle with their attraction to each other. Winner of 3 Golden Rooster Awards (the Chinese equivalent of the Oscars). Based on the novel by Feng Jicai.

results.title: Red ensign
results.creator_credit: Jerome Jackson, Gaumont-British Instructional and Michael Powell
results.brief_description: This is the story of David Barr, a shipbuilder, who fights to keep the shipyards open during the Depression of the 1930’s. David Barr fights the cautious businessman, Lord Dean, both for the affection of the heiress, June MacKinnon, and for the use of her money to finance his construction program. Stars Leslie Banks, Carol Goodner, Alfred Drayton, Frank Vosper.

results.title: Red ball express
results.brief_description: To the music of “Orange Blossom Special” a train changes shape and colour. The impressionistic animation is drawn directly onto the film. Music played by Cecil Creasey.

results.title: Recycling
results.creator_credit: Stuart Finley and Environmental Protection Agency
results.brief_description: Shows existing techniques for recovering materials from solid waste and describes the newly developed equipment and systems which may make recycling a universal project in the future. The pressure of public opinion in favour of recycling is enormous, nevertheless it is actually practised very little.

results.title: Recycled reflections
results.brief_description: A non-narrated film which first emphasises the potentially great waste in the single product, automobile bumpers, by exploring the piles of twisted discards. It then follows the process of transforming the damaged bumpers into good-as-new ones. Shows the recycling process from the heavy machines used to straighten the major dents and twists through hand-hammering, grinding, polishing and electro-plating. Finally, the transformed bumpers, indistinguishable from newly made ones, are plastic wrapped and stored awaiting use on new cars.
